mapinfo.detailsText:
Estabilish your colony in the nature of the Adirondack Mountains. 
 The lake around the cliff provides interesting tactical options, in addition to an extra source of food. 
 A trade route runs along the base of the mountain while the forest is home of several Huron villages. 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Huron 
 -Mercenaries: Renegado / Comanchero 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
